fields.description: For Batch based Student Group, the Student Batch will be validated for every Student from the Program Enrollment.
fields.label: Validate Batch for Students in Student Group

fields.description: For Course based Student Group, the Course will be validated for every Student from the enrolled Courses in Program Enrollment.
fields.label: Validate Enrolled Course for Students in Student Group

fields.description: If enabled, field Academic Term will be Mandatory in Program Enrollment Tool.
fields.label: Make Academic Term Mandatory

fields.options:

fields.description: By default, a new User is created for every new Student. If enabled, no new User will be created when a new Student is created.
fields.label: Skip User creation for new Student

fields.description: Enabling this option will let the student select from the courses defined in program otherwise courses will be fetched from academic curriculum
fields.label: Fetch Courses From Program

fields.description: The maximum number of hours that a student can select when applying for courses. If 0 is specified, there is no limit.
fields.label: Maximum number of hours

fields.description: The minimum number of hours that a student can select when applying for courses. If 0 is specified, there is no limit.
fields.label: Minimum number of hours

fields.description: Finishing a course is required for opening the next course.
fields.label: Prerequisites Are Based On Graduation
